about_the_game:
Item #: SCP-▉▉▉▉

Class: Euclid Thaumiel

Special Containment Procedures: [Redacted] Containment Procedures are no longer in effect following the events of Incident-▉▉▉▉-4-A.

Due to the events of Incident-▉▉▉▉-4-A on [Redacted], SCP-▉▉▉▉ is currently outside of Foundation custody. There are no present plans to recontain SCP-▉▉▉▉. May God have mercy on those who stand in her way.

Description:

You are Leena Sorvoja, an elite GOC combat operative on a mission to extract her father from the depths of the Valravn Corp. Joined by rogue foundation asset Field Agent Walker, the two will face off against an army of the specialized mercenaries and weaponized anomalies. Containment has failed. Neutralize with prejudice.

Infiltrate and Eliminate

Featuring a mix of stealth and high-octane action, SCP: Valravn follows in the footsteps of games like F.E.A.R. and Trepang2. Outwit your foes and plan your attacks. Overpower them with an array of masterfully crafted firearms. Level the playing field against the horrors that stretch the borders of reality. Become what is feared in this dark place.

Tactical Shooter with a Twist

Death is swift in Valravn. But that knife cuts both ways. Experience a unique AI system that blurs the line between the stealth and action phases. Pay close attention to enemy callouts to react to your opponents before it’s too late. Featuring a unique integrated UI, you’ll have to keep track of your munitions if you want to survive. Victory is earned. Nothing is impossible.

Inhuman Horrors

What horrors lurk deep within the labs of the nefarious Valravn research facilities? Renowned for weaponizing the anomalous, Valravn will bring all manner of unearthly terrors to bear. Adapt to new dangers, or become their prey.

Enter the Depths of Horror

Featuring a full story campaign, SCP: Valravn will take you through Leena’s harrowing journey through the darkest fringe of the secretive underworld. Featuring a story from the original Valravn author, Kilerpoyo. Uncover mad gods, murderous AI, and secrets that will shape your destiny. That which is hidden will be brought to light.

You never lose a war, when war is what you sell.

content_descriptors.notes: Depiction of firefights, hand-to-hand combat using weapons, bodily gore/decapitation.
